value.stringValue: The Opportunity_INV_CRMG_Conversions-6 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke Opportunity_INV_CRMG_Conversions-6, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The Opportunity_INV_CRMG_Conversions-6 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke Opportunity_INV_CRMG_Conversions-6, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.
